examples: The fruit juice tasted slightly alcoholic.
The guests left in an alcoholic haze.

meanings.def: regularly drinking too much alcohol and unable to stop easily, so that it has become an illness
a person who regularly drinks too much alcohol and cannot easily stop drinking, so that it has become an illness
examples: Howe was turning into an alcoholic because of the stress of his job.
I don’t think an alcoholic can dry out without proper medical help.
